ZFit_class Class Reference
[ZFitter: module for working with ECALELF ntuples, in particular for fitting the Z lineshape]

Class for parametric fit to the Z lineshape from any RooAbsData. More...

#include <Calibration/ZFitter/interface/ZFit_class.hh>

Public Member Functions

 ZFit_class (TChain *data_chain_, TChain *signal_chain_, TChain *bkg_chain_, TString invMass_VarName="invMass_SC", double invMass_min=65, double invMass_max=115, double bin_width=0.5)

Detailed Description

Class for parametric fit to the Z lineshape from any RooAbsData.

This class provide a unified way of dealing with multiple possible parametric fits to the Z lineshape. The implemented fit PDFs are:

  • BW+CB
  • Cruijff

Parameters:

bkg_chain_ pointer to the chain "selected" of background MC (QCD). The chain should have already all the friends. ACTUALLY NOT USED!
invMass_VarName name of the branch containing the invariant mass to be used
